casebody.data:
ABAX LOTUS LTD. et al., Respondents,
v.
CHINA MOBILE MEDIA TECHNOLOGY INC. et al., Defendants, Zhang Zhengyu, etc., Appellant. 2017-1167 Court of Appeals of New York. February 13, 2018

Motion for leave to appeal dismissed for failure to demonstrate timeliness as required by Rules of the Court of Appeals ( 22 NYCRR 500.22 [b] [2] ).
